title: Daft Punk- (2013) Random Access Memories  Projeto Chernobyl
description:
Daft Punk's new album Random Access Memories finds them leaving behind the highly influential, riff-heavy EDM they originated to luxuriate in the sounds, styles, and production techniques of the 1970s and early 80s. The record will remain something that draws from the past but sounds like little else right now, an album about rediscovery that's situated in the constantly-shifting present.
